findings.observations: Identified germline and somatic pathogenic variants in the chromatin-remodeling gene SMARCA4.

findings.macroscopic_features: Pale, friable, nodular with small peripheral cysts.
histologic_features: Mostly solid sheets of small round blue cells organized into poorly circumscribed nodules.
Nodules intermixed with myxoid and spindle-cell areas with small capillary networks.
Presence of cysts lined by ciliated pseudostratified epithelium and squamous epithelium.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Serum alpha-fetoprotein and beta human chorionic gonadotropin test
